seo.title: Odwołane promy i wzburzone morze
seo.description: Co robić, gdy promy nie płyną z powodu pogody, alternatywy i jak sprawdzać status kursów.

intro: Keep a land-based backup ready and monitor live alerts so you still make your connection.

sections.title: Refunds & vouchers
body: Let staff know whether you prefer the next available sailing or a season voucher before you leave the counter.

sections.title: Managing overnight delays
body: Ask the port info point about shared taxis, substitute shuttles, or bag storage if you need to wait for the following morning.

faqs.q: How do I know when sailings resume?
a: Ticket-desk staff can also confirm if the next boat is running before you leave the port.
